text: The term Elephant grass may refer to the following grass species: * The Asian Miscanthus giganteus, also known as giant miscanthus, commonly used as a biomass crop * The African Pennisetum purpureum, also known as napier grass, Uganda grass or giant king grass * The Asian Arundo donax, also known as giant cane, giant reed * The Eurasian Saccharum ravennae, also known as ravennagrass or ekra
title: Elephant grass
